name: CloudFormationCreateOrUpdateStack
description: Creates a new AWS CloudFormation stack or updates the stack if it exists.
author: Amazon Web Services

inputs.name: awsCredentials
inputs.label: AWS Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AWS credentials to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'AWSCredentials'

inputs.name: stackName
inputs.label: Stack Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The name that is associated with the stack. The name must be unique in the region in which you are creating the stack.

A stack name can contain only alphanumeric characters (case sensitive) and hyphens. It must start with an alphabetic character and cannot be longer than 128 characters.

inputs.name: templateFile
inputs.label: Template File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the template file for the stack. For more information, go to the [Template Anatomy](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/template-anatomy.html) in the AWS CloudFormation User Guide.

inputs.name: templateParametersFile
inputs.label: Template Parameters File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file containing the template parameters. For more information, go to the [Template Anatomy](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/template-anatomy.html) in the AWS CloudFormation User Guide.

inputs.name: onFailure
inputs.label: On Failure
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Determines what action will be taken if stack creation fails. 

 Default: ROLLBACK

inputs.name: disableRollback
inputs.label: Disable Rollback
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Set to true to disable rollback of the stack if stack creation failed. You can specify either DisableRollback or OnFailure, but not both. 

 Default: false

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable that will contain the ID of the stack on task completion. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the stack ID in subsequent tasks.

messages.StackExists: Stack exists, switching to stack update mode
messages.StackNotExist: Stack does not exist, switching to stack create mode
messages.CreateStackFromTemplate: Creating stack using template file '%s', parameters file '%s'
messages.UpdateStackFromTemplate: Updating stack using template file '%s', parameters file '%s'
messages.TemplateFilesLoadFailure: Failed to load and/or parse the template or template parameters file, error: %s
messages.StackCreated: Stack %s transitioned to create complete status
messages.StackCreationFailed: Stack %s failed to reach completion status, error: %s
messages.StackCreateRequestFailed: Error requesting stack creation, error message: %s
messages.StackUpdated: Stack %s transitioned to update complete status
messages.StackUpdateFailed: Stack %s failed to reach update completion status, error: %s
messages.StackUpdateRequestFailed: Error requesting stack update, error message: %s
messages.CreatedStackId: Stack creation completed, new stack id %s
messages.WaitingForStack: Waiting for stack %s to reach create create or update completed status
messages.NoWorkToDo: The service detected no changes in the template and/or parameters and declined to update the stack.
